doc.field: Series I: De Gaulle Materials and related materials
Series I: De Gaulle Materials and related materials

The series is approximately 16 linear feet and consists of two subseries: De Gaulle Materials and Related Materials and Institut Charles de Gaulle. This series reflects Wahl's study of Gaullism, de Gaulle, and French politics, an interest that began with his graduate studies during the transition of the 4th into the 5th Republic and de Gaulle's return to power by 1958. Documents include publications, notes, political flyers, correspondence, and conference materials.
